title: Harusame Tunnel
alternative_title: 春雨トンネル ; A Tunnel of Spring Rain
status: 春雨トンネル ; A Tunnel of Spring Rain
description:
Description :
        The rain that started to fall turned into April's last snowfall. On that day, my sister died. My shoulders that wouldn't stop shaking... were held down by Eiji." Although Asahi knew Eiji only pampered him as a replacement, it doesn't stop him from harboring romantic feelings for his sister's former fiancee. The feelings won't come across, the love won't bloom, but Asahi still stays beside the man he loves. Until one night...
